tasks.label: Print all tags and categories
args: dir public\categories -exclude index.html -name; echo ==TAGS===; dir public\tag -exclude index.html -name

tasks.label: Append tags and categories to current file
args: (dir public\categories -exclude index.html -name) | Out-File \"${file}\" -Append; (echo ==TAGS===) | Out-File \"${file}\" -Append; (dir public\tag -exclude index.html -name) | Out-File \"${file}\" -Append
